changeSet.author: sgf
changeSet.sql: update metadata.dataset d set short_name = p.persistent_identifier from metadata.project p where p.dataset_id = d.id and p.persistent_identifier != d.short_name

changeSet.author: sgf
changeSet.sql: update metadata.dataset d set title = a.name from metadata.project p join metadata.activity a on p.id = a.id where p.dataset_id = d.id and a.name != d.title

changeSet.author: sgf
changeSet.sql: update metadata.dataset d set description = a.description from metadata.project p join metadata.activity a on p.id = a.id where p.dataset_id = d.id and a.description != d.description
